If currency conversion is enabled, you must enter at least one conversion rate
phrases.packages.financial.currencies.rounding.b:
When converting other currencies to this currency, the number obtained will be rounded up.
The conversion accuracy will be the number of decimal numbers in the output. Will be rounded.
Example: 17.8912 converts 0 to 18 with accuracy
Example: 17.8912 converts 1 to 17.9

When converting other currencies to this currency, if there is a decimal part in the output, the decimal part numbers will be the 'precision' number. (The deleted part will be rendered upwards)
If the 'precision' is zero, the output number will be without the decimal part.
e.g: (precision: 2) 77.89 becomes 77.89
e.g: (precision: 1) 77.89 becomes 77.9
e.g: (precision: 0) 77.89 becomes to 78
e.g: (precision: -1) 77.89 becomes 80

When converting other currencies to this currency, the number obtained will be rounded up.
The conversion accuracy will be the number of decimal numbers in the output. Will be rounded.
Example: 17.8912 converts 0 to 18 with accuracy
Example: 17.8912 converts 1 to 17.9...
